name: Rawy
tag_list: comics, arabic, english, artist, drawing, innovation
overview:
We start producing Arabian comics to distribute it through mobiles and tablets on different platforms. The objective is to create interactive learning stories, games inside a magazine full of morals, wisdom and education for kids.

It will be a series of stories issues every month. The main character is Fares. He is around 10 years old boy with no super powers who lives in a normal house with his family. Our target is to make Fares a role model for kids. The stories will consist of three different lines:

  1. Morals and wisdom: He will face different situations where the kid can learn and understand morals and wisdom in an easy way.
  2. Adventures: He will travel around the globe where he can see different places and he will exposed to other customs and traditions. We may ask him by the end of the story about some of the information that he came across.
  3. Decision Making: The kid interact with the story to choose from different options and see the alternate ending based on his choice. The Games will be
  4. Educational Games
  5. Brain training Games The Magazine will be available in Arabic and English.
